metadata.name: MEMORIAL15
metadata.description:
It’s the story of a Divine Women living in 2069. She survived to WW4 and started to explore the world trying to find what happened.
After multiple adventures she find the New Eden, created by a community where few people support each other’s, trying to spread love and art, this community is called AVRIL15.
A drone catch this picture of her observing the memorial statue created the 29th March 2022. 
She was wearing an OGcollective hat given by a collective of helper that gave her advices to reach her objective.
